body:
Hey! I am Stormer! 

I am a gamer from the Netherlands, I love playing minecraft however this are not the only games I play, I like to play Prison architect, CS:GO and besiege too! 

This the second time I post something on this forums, Ask away!

replies.body: Hey! Welcome to the Avicus network, if you have any questions don't be afraid to ask :D !
replies.body_tagged: Hey! Welcome to the Avicus network, if you have any questions don't be afraid to ask :D !

replies.body:
What's up buddy! Here's my dutch questions for you.. o/

  • Do you like FEBO Nederland?
  • Do you like AJAX???
  • On a regular basis, to you secretly smuggle extra stroopwafels into your lunches? 
  • Do you like raw herring?
  • Ben je een jonge?
Anyways.. Welcome!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
@_Phyre: not at all, im a noob :P
@straightened: about 200 took me a long time to build, was in alpha 20 or something... after that more and more problems appeared so I made a new one.
@SeniorSombrero: that is a whole list! 
I don't go to the FEBO that much but I guess it is nice, I am not the greatest soccer fan so J don't really like any clubs,. None is allowed to know how many stroopwafels I eat :P I don't really like herring :< en yes I am a guy
